about_the_game:
The complete soundtrack for highly-praised Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes by composer Liam Sauvé.

Includes all music heard in game plus 2 unreleased bonus tracks in MP3 and FLAC.

Total running time: 43:12

Proceeds support the artist.
